N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 §§ 197-5.15 - Attics

State Regulations
(a) Home inspectors
shall observe and report on any safe and readily accessible attic space
describing: (1)
the method of observation
used; and
(2)
conditions
observed. (b) inspectors are not required to enter any attic where no walkable floor is
present or where entry would, in the opinion of the home inspector, be
unsafe. Notes
